Class HTMLNorm

  org.fit.cssbox.css.HTMLNorm

public class HTMLNorm
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides a mechanism of converting some HTML presentation atributes to the CSS styles.

Method Detail

attributesToStyles

public static void attributesToStyles(org.w3c.dom.Node n,
                                      java.lang.String tab_inh)
Recursively converts some HTML presentation attributes to the inline style of the element. The original attributes are left in the DOM tree, the style attribute is modified appropriately. Some of the values (e.g. the font sizes) are converted approximately since their exact interpretation is not defined.

Parameters:
n - the root node of the DOM subtree where the conversion is done
tab_inh - the inline style inherited from a parent table, empty if we're not in a table
